review: Before i tell why this game is recommended,one question:why people(you know the space suit guy)want to rage war on mars(i think is mars)?By the looks of it,this game looks like minecraft.Im be honest with that,but theres have bugs or glitch(idk what to say :( )like fall to the world(i know is early access).I liked the controllers and the weapons but is so hard to get some of the weapons,even you can make like a cat or robot.

This game,i cant said it anymore.Really...really good,now people like to play this game(im not currently play right now but),i like when people just buy and play the game with other people.This game i think already have so many people from around the world!
This game is old but old game can be play so many people because is AWESOME!!!!
